item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by W.H. Auden
item.description:
"<b>Funeral Blues</b>
Stop all the clocks, cut off the telephone, Prevent the dog from barking with a juicy bone, Silence the pianos and with muffled drum Bring out the coffin, let the mourners come.
Let aeroplanes circle moaning overhead Scribbling on the sky the message 'He is Dead'. Put crepe bows round the white necks of the public doves, Let the traffic policemen wear black cotton gloves.
He was my North, my South, my East and West, My working week and my Sunday rest, My noon, my midnight, my talk, my song; I thought that love would last forever: I was wrong.
The stars are not wanted now; put out every one, Pack up the moon and dismantle the sun, Pour away the ocean and sweep up the wood; For nothing now can ever come to any good." -- W.H. Auden

item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by Muhammad Ali
item.description: "I Ain't Got No Quarrel With The VietCong...No VietCong Ever Called Me Nigger." -- Muhammad Ali

item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by Martin Niemoeller
Pollytipsy add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "When I'm good, I'm very good, but when I'm bad, I'm better. " -- Mae West

item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "Those who are easily shocked should be shocked more often." -- Mae West

item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "Too much of a good thing can be wonderful!" -- Mae West

item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "Good women are no fun... The only good woman I can recall in history was Betsy Ross. And all she ever made was a flag." -- Mae West

item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "An eye for an eye will only make the whole world blind." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by John Connolly
item.description: "They were on the side of the angels, even if the angels weren't entirely sure that this was a good thing." -- John Connolly

item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by Apple Computer Inc.
item.description: "Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do." -- Apple Computer Inc.

item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I'm not afraid of death; I just don't want to be there when it happens." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain." -- Bob Marley

item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by Laurel Thatcher Ulrich
item.description: "Well-behaved women seldom make history." -- Laurel Thatcher Ulrich

item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "In heaven, all the interesting people are missing." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "As usual, there is a great woman behind every idiot." -- John Lennon

item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "Good girls go to heaven, bad girls go everywhere." -- Mae West

item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by Tallulah Bankhead
item.description: "I'm as pure as the driven slush." -- Tallulah Bankhead

item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by Tallulah Bankhead
item.description: "My father warned me about men and booze but he never said anything about women and cocaine." -- Tallulah Bankhead

item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by Tallulah Bankhead
item.description: "Cocaine isn't habit forming. I should know, I've been using it for years" -- Tallulah Bankhead

item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by Lily Tomlin
item.description: "The trouble with being in the rat race is that even if you win, you're still a rat." -- Lily Tomlin

item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by Lily Tomlin
item.description: "Reality is a crutch for people who can't cope with drugs." -- Lily Tomlin

item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by Rita Rudner
item.description: "When I meet a man I ask myself, 'Is this the man I want my children to spend their weekends with?" -- Rita Rudner

item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "I hate to advocate drugs, alcohol, violence, or insanity to anyone, but they've always worked for me." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by Robin Williams
item.description: "Reality is just a crutch for people who can't handle drugs." -- Robin Williams

item.title: Pollytipsy add a quote by Salvador Dali
item.description: "I don't do drugs. I am drugs." -- Salvador Dali
